  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2571</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Effiects of the three types of Seismic waves formed during an Earthquake</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Effiects der drei Typen der seismischen 
Wellen bildete sich während eines Erdbebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Effiects des trois types de vagues séismiques 
a formé pendant un tremblement de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Effiects dos três tipos de ondas seismic deu 
forma durante um terremoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Effiects dei tre tipi di onde sismiche ha 
formato durante il terremoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Effiects των τριών τύπων σεισμικών κυμάτων που 
διαμορφώνονται κατά τη διάρκεια ενός σεισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Effiects de los tres tipos de ondas sísmicas 
formó durante un terremoto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the three types of seismic waves produced by an earthquake : s,p and l, and what their effects are on the surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earthquakes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seismic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die drei Typen der 
seismischen Wellen zeigt, produzierte durch ein Erdbeben: s,p 
und L und was ihre Effekte auf den surroundigs sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les trois types de 
vagues séismiques a produit par un tremblement de terre : s,p 
et l, et ce qui sont leurs effets sur les surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstrasse os três tipos de 
ondas seismic produziu por um terremoto: s,p e l, e o que seus 
efeitos são nos surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra i tre tipi di onde 
sismiche ha prodotto da un terremoto: s,p e l e che cosa i loro 
effetti sono sui surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τους τρεις τύπους 
σεισμικών κυμάτων που παράγονται από έναν σεισμό: s,p 
και λ, και τι τα αποτελέσματά τους είναι στα surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra los tres tipos de 
ondas sísmicas produjo por un terremoto: s,p y l, y cuáles son
sus efectos en los surroundigs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erdbeben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">seismische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tremblements de terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues séismiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terremotos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas seismic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terremoti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde sismiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεισμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεισμικά κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">terremotos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas sísmicas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
